Heading: I'm Rina. A girl in tech who loves to build!
AboutText: I am currently a student pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science. Programming was always a side hobby for me and during the pandemic, I took it more seriously and started teaching myself how to program every moment I could in my free time. I graduated with a B.S. in Human Physiology in 2021 and began my journey as a software engineer shortly after.
AboutText2: I am into anything related to software engineering that requires creativity. My main interests are fullstack development, fintech, and machine learning. In my free time, I enjoy PC games, the outdoors, lots of coffee, and watching Ghibli films.
